name: Final Fantasy XV: Episode Prompto
description:
Final Fantasy XV: Episode Prompto is a downloadable extra episode for Final Fantasy XV. It takes place at the same time as chapter 12 of the main game and follows Prompto Argentum as he tries to escape imperial capture and reunite with his friends.

It was released on June 27, 2017, and is available for purchase via the PlayStation Network store and the Xbox Live marketplace. The episode is also included in the game's Season Pass.
